title: Golden Palace — Real Estate & Architecture
hero_subtitle: Luxury Architecture Inspired by City & Sea
about_title: Innovation Inspired by City and Sea
about_p1: Since 1997, Golden Palace Architecture has been shaping modern architecture with its visionary projects. By blending art with engineering, we design not just structures, but living and inspiring spaces.
about_p2: Our team brings a unique perspective to every project, delivering results that exceed client expectations by combining sustainability, aesthetics, and functionality.
service_p_1: We offer creative and functional solutions, from concept development to implementation projects.
service_p_2: Aesthetic and ergonomic interior solutions that reflect the spirit of your spaces.
service_p_3: We restore historical and cultural heritage structures to their original state, preserving them for the future.
service_p_4: We meticulously manage all processes from project inception to delivery, ensuring on-time completion.
contact_info_address_p: Mimar Sinan Cd. No: 42/A, Golden Palace Tower Floor: 12, Istanbul/Turkey
footer_copyright: © 2025 Golden Palace Architecture. All rights reserved. | Design and Innovation Studio.
page_otel_p: Luxury accommodation and suites with sea views.
page_gallery_p: Click on the images for details.
page_insaat_p: Modern city structures and innovative engineering solutions.
page_restorasyon_p: We carry historical buildings into the future.
